name: Neat Slider
author: Amjad Ali

sections.description:
Neat Slider is powerful and easy to use WordPress responsive slider plugin. Lets start build dynamic sliders for website pages. You can customize each slider as you like changing its width, height, Slides Transition and Appearance and other things. You can create unlimited number of slides and can easy import and export it for move sliders between sites easily it is work with WordPress default import and export function feature.

Check Out Neat Slider Demo

Neat Slider documentation is available on energeticthemes.com and we offer free support on our support forum..

Fully Responsive Slider

Neat Slider high functionality on wide range of screen sizes in any devices. Slider adapts to any screen size (try to re-sizing your browser). Slider always works and looks great on all devices.

Easy to Design Slideshow

Its really easyto design slider with Neat Slider you donâ€™t need to touch any code to design any slide or creating a new layer on slide you just need to do selecting options and putting values.

Cross Browser Compatibility

Neat Slider is cross browser compatible it works great in major types of browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE and Opera. Just give a try your self and check the compatibility.

Clean and Simple Slider

Neat Slider help you to bring goodness in your website. Its let you create easily image galleries and content sliders width mind-blowing slideshows simple elegant effects.

Informations about Updates and New Things are always announced on Twitter and Facebook. Join us on Twitter, Facebook and stay update. ðŸ™‚

Neat Slider On GitHub
sections.installation:
• Upload and install Neat Slider in the same way you’d install any other plugin.
  • Read the usage documentation on Energeticthemes.com
